div.p: Orto Botanico, Università degli Studi, Padua.

p.seg: Wollen Sie so freundlich sein, hochgeehrter Herr Professor, wenn Sie im Druck etwas über Pilze, die ich Ihnen sende, bekannt machen, meinen Namen in parenthesi neben den des Sammlers zu nennen, damit meine Anstalt für die Sendung öffentliche Anerkennung erhält.

div.p:
Would you be so kind, highly esteemed Professor, if you make known in print something about fungi that I send to you, to give my name in parentheses next to that of the collector, so that my institution receives public acknowledgment for the sending.
Saccardo (1893) acknowledged M in a general introductory paragraph, but the feature M requested has not been found in any publication up to 1900 by Saccardo where he is author of Australian species listed in FNI (accessed 22 August 2022).
